pages.text: $(thing)Slimes$() and $(thing)Magma Cubes$() are peculiar beings. Upon being hurt enough, they $(thing)split$() into smaller versions of themselves, similarly to how cells multiply in the body. This natural process can be exploited by the $(item)Offshoot Observer$(): When such a creature splits in its vicinity, the created entropy will be consumed and $(aura) will be dispersed into the environment.

Needless to say, the amount of $(aura) created is based on the $(thing)size$() and $(thing)rarity$() of the creature.$(br)It should also be noted that, while the $(item)Offshoot Observer$() is in the process of dispering $(aura), causing an additional creature to split will not cause any more $(aura) to be created.
